name: Novels Into Movies Quiz | Something in Common | 10 Questions

questions.text: Who wrote the Novel that the Movie 'Chitty Chitty Bang Bang' was based on ?
questions.explanation:
Ian Fleming.

	Yes, the same person who created James Bond.

questions.text: What is the last name of the Author who wrote 'The Bonfires of the Vanities'?

questions.explanation:

questions.text: What Alice Walker Novel became a movie starring Oprah Winfrey?
options: Both Beloved and The Color Purple
questions.explanation:
The Color Purple.

	Toni Morrison wrote "Beloved".

questions.text: Which of the following is NOT a novel (that already has been or is the planning stages to be made into a movie) with Hannibal Lector as a Character?
The Movie '13th Warrior' was based on a novel by which Author?
options: None of These are correct answers
questions.explanation:
Michael Crichton.

	It was based on Crichton's Eaters of the Dead.
